plot: Wherever Marjorie walks, the ground is covered with a thick layer of snow. It has been many weeks since she has even hoped of finding someone. There is no life anywhere, except for a dog that follows her from town to town.
title: Tête blanche
plot_es: Wherever Marjorie walks, the ground is covered with a thick layer of snow. It has been many weeks since she has even hoped of finding someone. There is no life anywhere, except for a dog that follows her from town to town.
plot_en: Wherever Marjorie walks, the ground is covered with a thick layer of snow. It has been many weeks since she has even hoped of finding someone. There is no life anywhere, except for a dog that follows her from town to town.
